tags: this is one reason ive taken a step back from the phandom
summary: Which will come first? Dan uploading or the phandom stop acting like entitled brats?!?
body:
Which will come first? Dan uploading or the phandom stop acting like entitled brats?!?

My money’s on Dan uploading. We suck.

reblog.comment:
Which will come first? Dan uploading or the phandom stop acting like entitled brats?!?

My money’s on Dan uploading. We suck.

trail.content_raw:
Which will come first? Dan uploading or the phandom stop acting like entitled brats?!?

My money’s on Dan uploading. We suck.
trail.content:
Which will come first? Dan uploading or the phandom stop acting like entitled brats?!?

My money’s on Dan uploading. We suck.

body:
Let’s make something clear

I have seen so far dozens of posts that blame, shame or mock the PTO 2004 movie, especially due to Gerald’s voice. Thus, allow me to make something clear.

  1. Stop doing that. If u indeed hate the movie so much then keep it to urselfs. I personally was afraid to say I love the movie due to the hate i would recieve.
  2. For some other this movie is simply amazing n even our first contact with the whole idea and world of the Phantom.
  3. Yes Gerald is not professional tenor but for many people (who can recognise singing differences or not) his voice is simple beautiful
  4. For those who have problem with Gerald just remember that ALW himself gave approval n loved him as the Phantom.
  5. He gave us a different Phantom n for many he is much better than Ramin or Ben ir Michael and thus let them be. Do not attack them just for stating freely who they liked.
  6. The movie is different from the Broadway. Some songs or costumes are even slightly differently but that is the beauty of it. Each one give their own touch to the story. So do not use that as an excuse to throw mud to such a great movie.
  7. People can love both Broadway and musical. People can support both sides and should be free to express that.

(Not everyone is like that though so if y know u are not one of them, do not get offended. No one please dont. I just state my opinion)

blog.name: thephandommonthly
blog.title: The Phandom Monthly
blog.description:
A magazine that is published monthly by members of the Phandom. This is meant to keep everyone up to date as to what is going on within the world of Dan and Phil and their "phans".

View All the Magazines | Meet the Admins

summary: Even though the content in the phandom has been sparse, we are still producing content of our own and we need more hands on...
body:
Even though the content in the phandom has been sparse, we are still producing content of our own and we need more hands on deck, as right now, we only have a few writers! 

We’re looking to add a couple more writers and editors for permanence on the magazine to be admins! We have an application for you to fill out and to ensure that you’re serious about wanting to be an admin, we’ve added a few things for you do to show us what you can do!  We’ll be choosing 2-3 writers and 1-2 editors! Applications for this close on May 15th and shortly after we will choose and get in contact with those who made it! 

Author Application 

* We’ve asked for you to write a 100-300 word piece on Phil’s new merch as part of the requirement for the applications.

Some qualities and quirks of the job are:

  • You get to work with fantastic people. Seriously. You’ll love us.
  • You’ll have pretty much free-hand at what you want to write about, as long as it’s about Dan and Phil obviously.
  • You’ll help research ideas with us, pitch ideas, and write them. 
  • You’ll have great experience when it comes to actually working in a job since this is a job. 

Editor Application

* You will need to have access to iCloud OR to Apple’s software Pages
* We’ve asked for you to create a mock cover for the magazine to show us what you can do as part of the requirements of the application 

This isn’t meant to be tricky or to limit your chances! We just want to know that you’re serious about this. 

Some qualities and quirks of the job are:

  • You get to work with fantastic people. Seriously. You’ll love us.
  • You’ll have access to the magazine itself and per Alex, will be able to help tweak the photos and the formatting!
  • You’ll help research ideas with us, pitch ideas, and write them.
  • You’ll have great experience when it comes to actually working in a job since this is a job.

The magazine will become a major part of you. This is not something to take lightly. We’ll be taking those we feel are the most qualified. For anyone who has applied before but did not make it and wish to again, you’ll need to reapply again as this is a brand new application.

Now onto the next part. 
On the flip side, we’re also looking to have writers on standby! So recently the writers of the magazine have found it hard to complete what they need to due to prior commitments so we need people to step in and take their place for that month! This will not be an admin position.

Being a pinch hitter means that your name will be on a list for us to message when we need articles done. So if an admin cannot cover their article for the month, you’ll get a message to do so. 

Pinch Hitter Form

If you have any questions, let us know!

tags: ive been through this and i get it
its just so unfair and disrespectful to him
Im not doing it from a stan point of view
im doing it from a realistic point of view
summary: People being upset that Dan hasn’t said anything about his hiatus is ridiculous. People need a break. They don’t need to justify...
body: People being upset that Dan hasn’t said anything about his hiatus is ridiculous. People need a break. They don’t need to justify why they need it. They don’t need to justify how long they need it. I know y’all are desperate for content and or moving on because there’s nothing going on, but that’s so unfair and disrespectful to him. When Dan comes back he’s going to need somebody to be there to love and support him. He won’t be able to do it on his own. Just let him take his time and don’t criticize or attack him for doing what he has to.

reblog.comment: People being upset that Dan hasn’t said anything about his hiatus is ridiculous. People need a break. They don’t need to justify why they need it. They don’t need to justify how long they need it. I know y’all are desperate for content and or moving on because there’s nothing going on, but that’s so unfair and disrespectful to him. When Dan comes back he’s going to need somebody to be there to love and support him. He won’t be able to do it on his own. Just let him take his time and don’t criticize or attack him for doing what he has to.

Just let him take his time and don’t criticize or attack him for doing what he has to.

summary: Why do you think you have the right to tell us we have to like phil?? You dont have that right!!! We don't have to like phil...
question: Why do you think you have the right to tell us we have to like phil?? You dont have that right!!! We don't have to like phil because he is annoying and childish!!! Dan is mature and overall cuter!!!!
answer: BITCH!! THIS IS MY POINT!!! And I’m not saying you HAVE to like phil, you dont have to, what I’m saying is, it is wrong for you to claim you love “dan and phil” when what you mean is, you love dan!

reblog.comment: BITCH!! THIS IS MY POINT!!! And I’m not saying you HAVE to like phil, you dont have to, what I’m saying is, it is wrong for you to claim you love “dan and phil” when what you mean is, you love dan!

summary: You know what annoys me? The fact that with Phil's videos when dan is in them they get more views, but with Dan's videos when...
body: You know what annoys me? The fact that with Phil’s videos when dan is in them they get more views, but with Dan’s videos when phil is in them, they get less views. And I find that disgusting! Phil’s views are going down exponentially because there are so many people in this phandom and it they admit it or not only like dan, they may claim to like both dan and phil, but if dan is not in a video they dont watch it! Phil is the one actually making content at the moment, so if you really liked dan AND phil, you would be watching his content! And because for you guys that prefer videos of only dan, you’re not in the phandom, you’re in the dandom!

summary: Your lips are what kisses yearn for Summary: “Can we just kiss? just for a bit.” He whispers, cupping Phil’s face. “Kiss and...
body:
Your lips are what kisses yearn for

Summary:

“Can we just kiss? just for a bit.” He whispers, cupping Phil’s face. “Kiss and nothing else?”

Words: 2,312

AO3 link: :*

Written as a present for Katie who just graduated! Show my girl some love @doineedtohaveawordwithyou <3
